item.title: Core projects and experience
item.description: Neuroscience Doctoral Candidate Brown University BrainGate Project Dr. John P. Donoghue Lab Providence, RI Aug. 2005 - May 2017 Investigated brain-computer interface safety and usability factors essential for transitioning BCI technology from a controlled lab environment to the outside world. Catalyzed project-wide changes to experimental design, post-implant initial evaluation, and participant instruction. Analyzed, validated, and verified high volume, high resolution neural data sets across large variable spaces for dissertation study and collaborating projects, requiring precise knowledge of signal conditioning, filtering, aligning, and processing.
